title: Furnished apartments available, Public area Wi-Fi, Patio/ balcony
posting_body: Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a self-guided tour today!
Text us today with any Questions or to Schedule a Tour.
4250 Glencoe Ave., Marina Del Rey, CA, 90292
Walkable Living at Tierra del Rey Apartments
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 661 Sq.
Tierra Del Rey recently completed a beautifully crafted renovation.
You'll love the convenience of living at Tierra del Rey luxury apartment homes in the eminently walkable neighborhood of Marina del Rey.
Tall ceilings, private balconies or patios, and large walk-in closets greet you when you walk through the front door.
A luxurious pool area and a comfortable community clubhouse will be sure to capture your attention and impress visiting friends and family.
Pet-friendly apartments and an on-site dog run make sure your furry best friend is impressed too!
Check out available apartments at Tierra del Rey.
We are currently offering self-guided tours!
*Apartment amenities not available in every home.
Community amenities may require an additional fee.
We are pet friendly and a Wag!
For pet policy restrictions and fees, please visit the link in this ad.
